7350.name: The Outer Warrens
7350.description:
The tunnel opens into a wider passage slick with moisture and something
far more sinister. Strange symbols are carved into the walls, glowing
faintly with sickly purple light. The air itself feels wrong here, as
if reality is slightly bent. Scratching sounds echo from deeper within.

south.description: The sewer pool lies to the south.

7351.name: The Feeding Chamber
7351.description:
Bones litter the floor of this circular chamber - humanoid bones, picked
clean of all flesh. The walls pulse with a faint bioluminescence, and
alcoves carved into the stone hold more grisly remains. Something has
been feeding here for a very long time. The stench is overwhelming.

south.description: The outer warrens lie to the south.

east.description: An ornate archway leads to the inner sanctum.

7352.name: The Mindflayer's Sanctum
7352.description:
You have entered the heart of the horror. This vast chamber thrums with
psionic energy that makes your skull ache. A throne of fused bone and
metal dominates the center, surrounded by pools of dark, viscous fluid.
Tentacled shapes writhe in your peripheral vision. The Master waits.

west.description: The feeding chamber lies to the west.

7301.name: basilisk
7301.long_desc: A serpentine creature with deadly eyes lurks here.
7301.description: This reptilian horror has scales like rusted iron and eyes that gleam with petrifying malice. Its gaze seems to bore into your very soul, and you feel your muscles stiffen just from being near it.

7302.name: flayer
7302.long_desc: A gaunt humanoid with elongated fingers crouches here.
7302.description: This emaciated creature has grey, rubbery skin stretched tight over an angular frame. Its fingers end in razor-sharp claws, and its eyeless face seems to sense your presence through some unnatural means.

7303.name: mind flayer
7303.long_desc: A tentacled horror floats menacingly before you.
7303.description: This aberration defies natural law. Its bulbous head is dominated by four writhing tentacles where a mouth should be. Pupilless white eyes regard you with cold, alien intelligence. Psionic energy crackles around its elongated fingers.

7304.name: master mindflayer
7304.long_desc: The Master Mindflayer towers here, radiating psionic terror!
7304.description: This ancient mind flayer is twice the size of its lesser kin. Its purple-black skin pulses with barely contained psionic energy, and its tentacles writhe with eager anticipation. Centuries of consuming intellects have made it impossibly powerful. Its presence alone makes your thoughts feel like they're being siphoned away.

phases.message: [35mThe Master Mindflayer's eyes glow with terrible psychic power![0m

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.telegraph: [35mThe Master Mindflayer attempts to dominate a mind![0m
abilities.on_success_message: A party member turns against the group briefly!
